duties_responsibilities.duty: Provide administrative support for executives and managers.
Manage CEO’s calendar and prepare meeting notes.
Reconcile credit card statements and prepare reconciliation spreadsheets.
Assist event planner with planning and coordinating office, company, and corporate related events.
Budget and manage all facility purchases, including office supplies.
Prepare reports and presentations, update existing company documents.
Answer main phone line, transfer calls, and take messages.
Coordinate with HR Manager to send employee welcome e-mails, take employee photos, and put together new hire swag bags.
Run errands such as picking up lunch, dropping off proposals, and shopping for office essentials.
Receive and distribute mail/parcels, prepare and send multiple bulk mailings, UPS packages, etc.
Maintain relationships with and coordinate multiple professional organization and sponsorship renewals.
Assist Security Manager with enforcing security measures and maintaining secure entry and visitor logs.
Act as a point of contact for all general office inquiries, facilities, supplies, moves, etc.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in Business Administration or related field (Preferable)
